title: Ram Navami Violence in Bihar Sharif: Muslim women allege police misbehavior, loot
selftext: Bihar Sharif in Bihar’s Nalanda district witnessed violence during the Ram Navmi procession, resulting in the looting of shops and houses. However, allegations of misbehavior and loot by the police have now surfaced, leading to fear and insecurity among Muslim women in the town.
